subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=⿰忄蓄,稸,⿰禾蓄,⿱䒑畜,⿳⻀玆田,⿱𬝘田,𦿤,𧁖,𧁃}} <!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?educode=A03536 -->

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|艸|alt1=艹|t1=grass, plant|畜|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to cultivate plants, to store grain, to save.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=xù
|c=cuk1
|h=pfs=hiuk
|md=háe̤k/hé̤ṳk
|md_note=háe̤k - vernacular (“to get or buy for use”); hé̤ṳk - literary (“to store up; to rear; to harbour”)
|mn=ml:hiok/qz,tw,xm:thiok/tw,zz:hak
|mn_note=thiok/hiok - literary (“to store up”); hak - vernacular (“to purchase”)
|w=4xioq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[store up]]; to [[stockpile]]; to [[accumulate]]; to [[hoard]]
# to [[raise]]; to [[rear]] (domestic animals)
# to [[harbour]]; to [[keep]] in [[mind]]; to [[cherish]]
# to [[grow]] (e.g. a [[beard]])
# to [[await]]; to [[wait]] for
# {{lb|zh|Min}} to [[collect]]; to [[get]] or [[buy]] for [[use]]; to [[purchase]]
# [[storage]]; [[savings]]
# [[preserved]], [[dried]] [[cabbage]] or [[mustard greens]]

Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|蓄財|ちくざい}}: [[amass]]ing of [[wealth]]
* {{ja-r|蓄積|ちくせき}}: [[accumulation]]
